item.description:
Gloria will lead a 2-3 mile hike at the Belding Trout Management Area in Vernon. Dogs and kids welcome. Meet at the 7-11 on Route 30 in Vernon
at 2:00 PM.

Directions for the Hartford area:

* I-84 to Exit 66
* Turn left off the exit and left again at the light.
* Cross over the highway and at the next light, turn right onto Route 30.
* Follow Route 30 to the 7-11 on the left (meet-up location).

Besides RSVP here, you should RSVP to Gloria (http://hiking.meetup.... ) at (860) 306-5349. Any questions should be directed to her.

This event is in conjunction with the Hartford Heights Tall Club (http://www.hhtallclub... ).

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Hike at Belding Trout Management Area, Vernon CT
